section_title: Consultative group of experts on non-Annex I national communications (CGE)
sentences: The CGE Chair introduced the progress report on the CGE s work (FCCC/SBI/2010/21 and Add.1) in the SBI plenary on 30 November.
The issue was further addressed in the contact group co-chaired by Anke Herold and Eric Mugurusi.
Discussions focused on surveys, technical reports, workshops and regional training activities.
On 4 December, the SBI adopted conclusions.
